id: scenario-value-scanner-person-with-disabilities-scenarios-family-family communication adapted for alex's accessibility needs
title: Family communication adapted for Alex's accessibility needs
description: Family communication adapted for Alex's accessibility needs
content:
Scenario: Family communication adapted for Alex's accessibility needs
    Given family uses various communication methods
    And some methods may not be accessible to Alex
    When family communicates
    Then the family_elohim should ensure Alex can participate fully
    And family should use accessible communication formats
    And Alex should not be excluded by inaccessible technology choices
    And family should be prompted to accommodate Alex's needs
    And accessibility should be automatic, not requested each time
    And Alex should have equal access to all family communication
    And the system should reduce Alex's communication barriers
